t: Amazon.com: Eco Candle Co: Candles
s: Eco Candle Co.® is an artisan candle company located in Appleton, Wisconsin. We have been handcrafting soy candles, handmade soap, natural bath & body products and more for 15 years! Our goal is to provide high quality products with respect for our environment and a healthy lifestyle.
